title: Amazon and Union Organizers in New York Agree on March Date for Election
sub_head: National Labor Relations Board must still approve plan for vote to be held
body:
Amazon.com Inc. workers at a facility in Staten Island, N.Y., have reached an agreement with the company to hold a union vote in March, according to union organizers and the company.
Organizers, which call themselves the Amazon Labor Union, reached an agreement with the company Wednesday to hold an in-person union election at the warehouse starting on March 25 and ending on March 30.
